titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on BenzYcd?indolium, 1-ethyl-2-Y1,2,3,4-tetrahydro-1- (2-hydroxyethyl)-2,2,4-trimethyl-6-quinolinyl?-,chloride.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/20/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on BenzYcd?indolium, 1-ethyl-2-Y1,2,3,4-tetrahydro-1- (2-hydroxyethyl)-2,2,4-trimethyl-6-quinolinyl?-,chloride.
